#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int get_int(){
int x=0;char c;int t=0;
for (c=getchar();(c<'0'||c>'9')&&c!='-';c=getchar());
if (c=='-'){t=1;c=getchar();}
for (;c>='0'&&c<='9';c=getchar()){x*=10;x+=c-48;}
if (t) x=-x;return x;
}

int main()
{
     int n,t,i ;  int arr[100010];
      t=get_int();
      while(t-- )
      {

        n=get_int();

      for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        arr[i]=get_int();

        if(n==0) { cout<<"YES"<<endl; continue; }
        if(n==1) {  cout<<"YES"<<endl; continue; }


      sort(arr+1,arr+n+1);

      long long int sum=0;
      arr[0]=0;

      for( i=1;i<=n;i++)
      {

          if(arr[i]<=sum+1)
            sum+=arr[i];
          else break;
      }

        if(i!=n+1)
            cout<<"NO"<<endl;
        else cout<<"YES"<<endl;
      }

      return 0;
}
